section.title: Associating a Method with an Automate Instance
section.para: Service methods have been split based on purpose.

procedure.title: To Associate the Method with an Automate Instance

step.para: From the accordion menu, click the required service method. Service Class is located at DOMAINServiceProvisioningStateMachinesMethods and DomainServiceRetirementStateMachinesMethods.

note.para: DOMAIN must be a user-defined Domain and not the locked ManageIQ Domain. If necessary, you can copy the class from the ManageIQ domain into a custom domain.

step.para: Either create a new instance or select the clone_to_service instance.
In the configurechilddialog value, put the path to the method.
Click Save or Add if you are adding this to a new instance.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: Now that the catalog items, service dialog, dialog methods, and service provision instance have been created, you can create the catalog bundle.
